Council_Bluffs.Omaha Zoo Railroad: The Omaha Zoo Railroad, or the OZRR, is the name of a 2 ft 6 in (762 mm) narrow gauge heritage railroad in Omaha's Henry Doorly Zoo & Aquarium in Omaha, Nebraska. The railroad offers a narrow gauge excursion train for zoo visitors hauled by a steam locomotive. The train loads passengers at two stations within the zoo.
